post.title: looking for a canon zoom lens
post.content: i am looking for a reasonably priced (under $300) zoom lens for a canon rebel xt eos 350d. i need something in the range of 70-300mm that can shoot clear actions shots at distance. an example would be rodeo action in daylight. i want to shoot in continuous shot mode without a tripod. please advise. robert krogle aprilanbbob@verizon.net
